wrinkle
Class Actor

java.lang.Object
  wrinkle.Collidable
      wrinkle.Actor
Direct Known Subclasses:
Enemy, Wrinkle
public abstract class Actor
extends Collidable

Abstract superclass of game actors -- that is, objects that have animations, sounds, etc.
